member.name: M:stigzler.Screenscraper.Services.ApiDataService.GetStrings(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Uri},System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.IProgress{stigzler.Screenscraper.EventArgs.ProgressChangedEventArgs})
